Sentencas: Exploitation of alternative anode materials for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LT-SOFCs, 350-650 degrees C) is technologically important but remains a major challenge.
Titulo: Highly Performing Chromate-Based Ceramic Anodes (Y0.7Ca0.3Cr1-xCuxO3-δ) for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Here we report a potential ceramic anode Yo(0.7)Ca(0.3)Cr(1-x)Cu(x)O(3-delta) (x = 0, 0.05, 0.12, and 0.20) (YCC) exhibiting relatively high conductivity at low temperatures (<= 650 degrees C) in both fuel and oxidant gas conditions.
Titulo: Highly Performing Chromate-Based Ceramic Anodes (Y0.7Ca0.3Cr1-xCuxO3-δ) for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Additionally, the newly developed composition (YCC12) is structurally stable in reducing and oxidizing gas conditions, indicating its suitability for SOFC anodes.
Titulo: Highly Performing Chromate-Based Ceramic Anodes (Y0.7Ca0.3Cr1-xCuxO3-δ) for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The I-V characteristics and performance of the ceramic anode infiltrated with Ni-(Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta)(GDC) were determined using GDC/(La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-delta)(LSC)-based cathode supported SOFCs.
Titulo: Highly Performing Chromate-Based Ceramic Anodes (Y0.7Ca0.3Cr1-xCuxO3-δ) for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: High peak power densities of similar to 1.2 W/cm(2) (2.2A/cm(2)), 1 W/cm2 (2.0A/cm(2)), and 0.6 W/cm(2) (1.3 A/cm(2)) were obtained at 600, 550, and 500 degrees C, respectively, in H-2/3% H2O as fuel and air as oxidant.
Titulo: Highly Performing Chromate-Based Ceramic Anodes (Y0.7Ca0.3Cr1-xCuxO3-δ) for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: SOFCs showed excellent stability with a low degradation rate of 0.015 V kh(-1) under 0.2 A/cm(2).
Titulo: Highly Performing Chromate-Based Ceramic Anodes (Y0.7Ca0.3Cr1-xCuxO3-δ) for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: YCC-based ceramic anodes are therefore critical for the advancement of LT-SOFC technology.
Titulo: Highly Performing Chromate-Based Ceramic Anodes (Y0.7Ca0.3Cr1-xCuxO3-δ) for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
